Why WiredTree?

» Complete Managementhttp://www.wiredtree.com/supportservices/
Our plans feature complete management - software + hardware + network + proactive monitoring. Quite simply, we take care of your server so that you can run your business. Our support is perfect for beginners, those moving from shared hosting to a dedicated, or those who wish to outsource server administration.

We provide you full 24/7/365 toll-free phone and help desk support for all software that comes installed on your managed server. Each server comes with 24/7/365 monitoring as well as proactive response to any downed services. Your server is kept up to date with all of the latest security patches. We provide full support for the hardware in your server, backed by one of the industry's best SLAs.

» Average ticket response time is under 15 minutes!

» Free Transfer Assistance: Need help moving from your old provider? Just ask! We can help, free of charge!

» Proprietary Client Portalhttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/controlpanel.php
Our client portal allows you full control over your server environment. You can perform remote reboots, monitor your server's health through IPMI 2.0, get detailed CPU/disk/memory performance statistics, view bandwidth graphs, configure bandwidth alerts, and manage your DNS and more.

» True Server-Grade Hardwarehttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/
All of our servers also feature the latest in true server-grade hardware. Our VPS servers feature quad-core Intel Xeon Clovertown processors, Fully Buffered ECC Memory, Hot Swap 8 disk RAID-10 RE arrays, and SuperMicro motherboards.

» ServerShield Server Hardeninghttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/serverhardening.php
All WiredTree VPS servers include our exclusive initial security hardening service, ServerShield, free of charge. This service saves you time and money by greatly increasing the security, performance, and reliability of your WiredTree server. It includes APF firewall, anti-spam and anti-virus configuration, Brute Force Detection, HTTP intrusion protection, and more!

» Extensive Featureshttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedvps/features.php
All VPS accounts are truly reseller-ready and come with full root access. Cpanel/WHM is included, as are private nameservers and generous disk space and bandwidth allowances. Additionally, they are backed up nightly to an off-server RAID array. Click here for a full feature list.

» WiredTree is not a reseller - we own all of our equipment and operate our own network!
We operate private datacenter space and own all of our network equipment and server hardware! Our network is powered by Savvis, Level(3) and RCN premium bandwidth. We use the latest in Juniper Routers and Cisco Switches. For more information, please visit our network and datacenter sections.
